summary: The diff implements all 10 requirements with high fidelity. Backend actor in main.mo covers products, cart, and orders with persistence. Frontend pages cover catalog, product detail, cart, checkout, order success, order history, and home page. Visual theme, logo, and hero banner are all implemented. No significant missing requirements were found, though truncation limits full verification of stable var persistence in the backend and the reverse-chronological order guarantee on the order history page.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system with name collection and ProfileSetupModal on first login
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not include a user profile setup feature. A profile modal requiring users to enter their name before shopping was not requested in any REQ.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-only access control for product CRUD operations using AccessControl/MixinAuthorization
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies CRUD operations for products but does not specify role-based access control. The build request also lists admin panel as a non-goal, yet the backend restricts createProduct/updateProduct/deleteProduct to admins via an authorization mixin.

hallucinated_features.description: Separate landing home page with hero section, feature highlights, and CTA section
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirements specify a product catalog page and other specific pages, but do not explicitly request a separate landing home page. This was added as an extra route beyond what was requested.
